title: 409: CHATTY BROS: Cassidy Chats Being the Villain!
itunes:title: 409: CHATTY BROS: Cassidy Chats Being the Villain!
description:
The Bros have a special episode for you today, Bros and Broads! They are joined by Cassidy Timbrooks - the OG “villain” from Clayton’s Bachelor season aka The Bro’s Bane! She chats about her feelings on being the first villain on the season, her strategy in the mansion, if she would do anything differently, Shanae, the “fk buddy” drama, her thoughts on Clayton, Bachelor in Paradise, and MUCH more! The Bros have a blast -  wow! (Insert Bane voice) *Mr. Wayne*. Thank you Cassidy!

CASSIDY TIMBROOKS:

Follow Cassidy on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/cassidytimbrooks/ 

Follow Cassidy on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@cassidytimbrooks 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***PELOTON: The Peloton Bike+ is now $500 less including FREE delivery and setup! Visit onepeloton.com to learn more 

***FIGS: Head to wearFIGS.com and use code CHATTYBROADS to get 15% off your first order
